_inspectorSnowReport.Report: Happy New Year! New year, new terrain Eagle Express is now open! Take a cruise down Sunshine Bowl and enjoy the mountain views. We are spinning five lifts, providing access to 24 trails. Due to early-season conditions, no beginner terrain is accessible from Moonbeam Express. Apex Express and Sunrise terrain should be considered experts only. All Sunrise terrain is ungroomed and early-season hazards exist. Snow is expected today as a new storm rolls through the mountains. The snow will be on the wet side until the snow line and temperatures drop tonight. 1-3 inches are possible today with another 3-7 expected overnight. New Years resolution: more days on snow! Rack up 10 days at Solitude to earn an exclusive sticker. Stop by the ticket office and show your pass to secure yours. Speaking of stickers dont slow the flow on powder days. Get your free UDOT traction law sticker and help keep traffic moving through traction law checkpoints. You can find the current traction law status and live canyon road cameras on UDOTs social media channels. Have a great holiday on the hill!

_inspectorSnowReport.Alert: Know The Code, limit your speed, and stay in control while skiing and riding.
